mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map showing the Boyd coal & iron lands: with a sketch of the country, including Wytheville, Va / by C.R. Boyd, C.E. ; Made Audust 1878
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: American Photo-Lithographic Company.
Boyd, Charles Rufus, 1841-1903
Boyd, Thomas Jefferson, 1804-1893
Noble, John S., 1806-1887
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Inset (Scale 10 miles-1 inch): Sketch showing the relative positions of the coal measures and the great iron and the lead and zinc belts of Wythe County, Va.
Includes an acreage table for separate land areas and an distance table.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: Split in half lengthwise at old fold line; water stained. From the Wythe County, Va., mining papers of John S. Noble and Thomas J. Boyd, MSS 14221.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mines and mineral resources--Virginia--Wythe County--Maps.
Coal lands--Virginia--Wythe County--Maps.
Iron mines and mining--Virginia--Wythe County--Maps.
